entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of rain or snow after midnight then 40 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow changing to 40 percent chance of rain or snow near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
